name: Forest of Colors
description:
A relaxing 2D game, where you play a color-fairy, whose job it is to bring back the colors to the forest. To do so, you have to paint, scribble and doodle paintings for the woodland critters!

Made by:

Jonas Margraf

Annalisa Riedel

Mia Wittenmeier

Sina Hofmann

The game was made during one semester, in the "Creating Games" class at the University of Applied Sciences Mainz (Timebased Media).
